Streams in the Desert - April 30

"The ugly, thin cows ate up the seven healthy, fat cows... and the thin heads of grain swallowed up the seven good, full heads" (Genesis 41:4,7). 🌾🐄

This strange dream has an important warning for us: ⚠️

🔹 Our best years, greatest victories, and finest achievements can be "eaten up" by later failures, disappointments, and uselessness in God's kingdom. 😔

Some people who started strong with amazing promise ended badly. This is sad but true. 😢 Yet it doesn't have to happen! ✨

S.D. Gordon said the only way to stay safe is by keeping "fresh touch with God" every day, every hour. ⏳🙏

👉 Yesterday's blessings and victories won't help me today - in fact, today's failures might erase them - unless they inspire me to do even better today. 💪

Only by staying close to Christ ("fresh touch with God") can we keep the "thin cows" and "bad grain" out of our lives. ✝️🛡️

- Messages for the Morning Watch
